text: WPS privacy policy
Update date: May 19, 2022
Effective date: May 24, 2022

Thank you for choosing WPS Office Software Services (hereinafter referred to as "this service") developed and operated by Zhuhai Jinshan Office Software Co., Ltd. and/or its related company (hereinafter referred to as "we").
Scope of application of this service:
WPS Office Personal Version Client (including clients running in Windows, Mac, Android, iOS, Linux operating system);

Access to WPS Office Personal Client, Jinshan Document Client (operating in Windows, Mac, Android, iOS operating system)Kingsoft form, Kingsoft calendar, Kingsoft to be managed, rice shells, WPS members and other services;

WPS Office WeChat/QQ/Alipay Mini Program, WPS Member WeChat/QQ/Alipay Mini Program, rice shell WeChat/QQ/Alipay applet, Jinshan form WeChat/QQ applet, Kingsoft calendar WeChat mini program, Kingsoft to run WeChat mini programs, File Assistant Mini Program.
Special Note:

Before you use this service, please be sure to read this policy carefully. We will always show us the personal information we collected in any part or in the process of any part or in the process of protecting your use of this service.
Important clauses that are closely related to your rights (possibilities) in this policy have been reminded by bold fonts to remind you. Please focus on it.
contact us

In order to effectively manage and protect your personal information, we have set up a special personal information protection team and person in charge. If you have any questions, opinions or suggestions on the protection of this policy or personal information, we can contact us through the following ways.Acceptance and processing within 15 working days:
Address: Building 5, Jinshan Software Park, No. 321, Qiandao Ring Road, Tangjiawan Town, Zhuhai City, Guangdong Province, Personal Information Protection Office (receipt)

Contact Information

text: definition

Related Company: Refers to controlling the company and institutions under the control of Zhuhai Jinshan Office Software Co., Ltd., controlled by Zhuhai Jinshan Office Software Co., Ltd. or under the joint control with Zhuhai Jinshan Office Software Co., Ltd..

Control refers to the ability to directly or indirectly affected the controlled management/operation of the controlled objects directly or indirectly through ownership, contract, actual operation association, or other methods identified in accordance with the law.
Personal information: Refers to various information related to recognized or recognized natural persons recorded in electronics or other ways, excluding information after anonymous processing.

Personal sensitive information: It refers to personal information that once leaked, illegally provided or abuses the security of people and property, and it is easy to lead to personal information that causes personal reputation, physical and mental health or discrimination. Make a significant identification with a thick body.
Personal information deletion: Refers to removing personal information in a system involved in daily business functions, so that it keeps them from being retrieved and accessed.
Personal information anonymity: Through the technical processing of personal information, you cannot be recognized, and the processing information after processing cannot be restored.
Application information: Including the package name, version number, distribution channels, and distribution channel types of host applications, it is based on the actual collection of the product.

Equipment information: Including device names, equipment brands, equipment models, device manufacturers, MAC address, device logo(MD5 values based on device MAC address encryption) Software feature information, operating system versions, operating system language, resolution, service provider network ID, sensor information (such as acceleration sensor, magnetic field sensor, gyroscope, pressure sensor), etc.), etc.), etc.)The actual collection of the product shall prevail.

Network location information: The general geographical location information obtained through IP address, operator information, base station information, nearby WiFi, connected WIFI obtained, and only collect it to the state/provincial/municipalities.

Accurate geographical location information: Obtaining accurate geographical location information obtained through sensor information such as GPS information and base stations, we will obtain your separate authorization before collecting this information.
How do we collect and use your personal information
For the following goals described in this policy, we will collect and use your personal information, and we will also explain through the "Personal Information Collection List".

In order to provide you with a service, we may need to apply to you within the necessary range to obtain the following permissions. We will explain the authority of the relevant operating system that may apply and use through the "Application Power List", and you can manage the relevant permissions according to actual needs.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
rewrite: In order to provide you with services, we may need to apply to you within the necessary range to obtain the following permissions.

text: Please rest assured that we will not open these permissions by default. Only after you have a separate consent, you will access it when you realize specific services/functions;
Even after your authorization, you can access your corresponding permissions, we will only access within the scope of your authorization and obtain the corresponding information (such as involved);
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
rewrite: Even after your authorization, we will only access within the scope of your authorization and obtain the corresponding information.

text: And you can withdraw authorization at any time. After you withdraw authorization, we will stop accessing the corresponding permissions, and we will no longer provide you with some services corresponding to it, but it will not affect the other services you provide.
label: Important
rewrite: After you withdraw authorization, we will stop accessing the corresponding permissions and will no longer provide you with some corresponding services, but it will not affect the other services you provide.

text: How do we use cookies and similar technologies
Cookie
To ensure the normal operation of this service, we will use related technologies to store small data files named Cookie from your device.
Cookie usually contains identifiers, site names, and some numbers and characters.
We may set up Cookie, which guarantees security and ensure security to confirm whether you log in to the service safely, or whether you encounter dispersion, fraud and other illegal behaviors.
label: Important
rewrite: Set up authentication and guarantee of security to confirm whether you log in to the service safely, or whether you encounter stolen, fraud and other illegal behaviors.

text: These technologies also help us improve service efficiency, improve login and response speed.
Using cookie can also help you save the steps and processes of your personal information and enter search content.
label: Important

text: We will not use Cookie for any purpose outside the purpose of this policy.
Do not track (Do not track)
You can manage or delete Cookie according to your preferences.
label: Important
Edit/Control

text: You can remove all the cookies saved on your device. Many network browsers have do, not, track functions, which can release Do, not, track requests to the website.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can remove all the cookies saved on your device.

text: At present, the major Internet standard organization has not yet established relevant policies to stipulate how websites should respond to such requests.
But if your browser enables Do Not Track, all our websites will respect your choices.

text: How do we protect and save your personal information
Technical protection

We will strictly abide by the relevant laws and regulations on handling personal information in mainland China, and adopt strict security protection measures to protect your personal information and prevent your personal information from being disclosed, use, modify, damage or lose.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will take strict security protection measures to protect your personal information.

text: The safety protection measures we have taken are as follows, but please understand that any security measures cannot be impeccable.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Although there are security measures, it is impossible to fully guarantee that there is no security problem.

text: When you send or collect information with our server, we ensure that the use of the transport layer security protocol (TLS, WSS) and other appropriate encryption algorithms encrypt it.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: When you send or collect information with our server, we ensure that the transfer layer security protocol is encrypted with other appropriate encryption algorithms.

text: Your personal information is all stored on a safe server and protected in the controlled facilities.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Your personal information is all stored on a safe server and protected in the controlled facilities.

text: We classify your information based on importance and sensitivity, and ensure that your personal information has corresponding security levels.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We classify personal information based on importance and sensitivity.

text: Similarly, we have special access control measures for data storage based on clouds. We regularly review information collection, storage and processing practice, including physical security measures to prevent any unauthorized access and use.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We have special access control measures for data storage based on clouds, and regularly review information collection, storage and processing practice.

text: We will perform their due diligence on third -party partners to ensure that they are capable of protecting your personal information.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will perform their due diligence on third -party partners to ensure that they are capable of protecting your personal information.

text: We will also check and evaluate it by implementing appropriate contract restrictions and conducting audit and evaluation when necessary to check whether the third party has adopted appropriate security standards.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will make an appropriate contract restriction and make audit and evaluation when necessary.

text: In addition, employees and third -party partners who visit your personal information all follow the obligations of strict contract confidentiality.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Employees and third -party partners who visit your personal information all follow the strict contract confidentiality obligations.

text: We will carry out training and examinations of information security and privacy protection to strengthen employees' awareness of protecting the importance of personal information.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will carry out training and examinations of information security and privacy protection to strengthen employees' awareness of protecting the importance of personal information.

text: We will revise and improve the above measures and management methods from time to time to improve the overall security.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: From time to time, we will revise and improve security measures and management methods to improve the overall security.

text: Security system guarantee

We establish a data security management system around the data life cycle, and improve the security of this service from the aspects of organizational construction, system design, personnel management, product technology, and personal information security impact assessment.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We establish a data security management system around the data life cycle.

text: At present, we have passed the third -level certification of information security level, ISO/IEC, 27001: 2013 information security international standard certification, ISO/IEC, 27701: 2019 personal information protection international standard certification.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: The system has passed the third -level certification of information security level, ISO/IEC 27001: 2013 information security international standard certification, ISO/IEC 27701: 2019 personal information protection international standard certification.

text: Information security incident processing

When we are informed of a security incident that has occurred, illegal provision or abuse of personal information, we will inform you in a timely manner in accordance with the requirements of laws and regulations: the basic situation and possible impact of security incidents, the disposal measures we have adopted or we are going to take, and we will adopt the disposal measures, and we have to take or to be taken.You can independently prevent and reduce risk suggestions, remedy measures, etc.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: If a personal information security incident occurs, we will inform your basic situation, possible impact, disposal measures, independent prevention suggestions, etc.

text: The incident -related situation will be informed by pushing notification. When it is difficult to inform you one by one, we will publish an announcement in a reasonable and effective way.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: The relevant situation of security incidents will be informed by mail, letter, telephone, push notification, etc. When it is difficult to inform one by one, it will issue an announcement.

text: At the same time, we will also report to the disposal of personal information security incidents in accordance with the requirements of the regulatory authorities.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Report the disposal of personal information security incidents in accordance with the requirements of the regulatory authorities.

text: How do we save your personal information
Storage place
In accordance with the provisions of laws and regulations, we store your personal information collected and generated during the operation of mainland China to mainland China.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: The personal information collected and generated in domestic operations will be stored in China.

text: At present, we will not transmit your personal information overseas. If we transmit to overseas, we will follow relevant state regulations or solicit your consent.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: We will not transmit your personal information abroad. If we transmit them abroad, we will follow relevant state regulations or solicit your consent.

text: Storage period
We will take reasonable and feasible measures to avoid collecting unrelated personal information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We will take reasonable and feasible measures to avoid collecting unrelated personal information.

text: We will only retain your personal information within the shortest period of the purpose of the cost of reaching the cost policy, unless you agree to extend the retention period or be permitted by law.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: Reserves your personal information within the time limit required for the service purpose, unless the law has other requirements.

text: After exceeding the storage period, we will delete your personal information or take technical measures for anonymized processing, except for other provisions of laws and regulations.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: After exceeding the storage period, your personal information will be deleted or anonymous, except for other provisions of laws and regulations.

text: Complaint report and response

If you have any opinions or you think your personal information rights may be infringed, or you can find a clue to infringe your right to personal information, you can contact us through the contact information of this policy.
We will accept and deal with it within 15 working days.
Viewing privacy policy

You can on the web page (URL is https://privacy.wps.cn/policies/privacy/wps-perfice) or WPS Office mobile client [I-Settings-Privacy Settings and Legal Terms] View the policy of this policyall content.
Please understand that the relevant functions of this service in this policy may be different according to factors such as the equipment model, system version, software application version you use.
Know the product and/or service in advance to stop operation

We will continue to provide you with high -quality services. If our part or all products and/or services are forced to stop operations for special reasons, we will send push messages to you in advance The collection of your personal information will be stopped and within the minimum period that complies with laws and regulations, we will delete or processes your personal information.
label: Important
Cessation of Operations
rewrite: When stopping operations, we will notify it in advance and delete or processes your personal information.

text: other

For example, according to the relevant provisions of the legal and effective handling of personal information at that time, your close relatives have the right to exercise, copy, correct, and delete your relevant personal information after your death.We encourage you to arrange another arrangement of your personal information in your will or other inheritance plans.

rewrite: After your death, your close relatives have the right to exercise, copy, correct, and delete your relevant personal information for your own legal and legitimate interests.

text: Protection of personal information of minors
We attach great importance to the protection of personal information of minors.
According to the relevant laws and regulations, if you are a minor under the age of 18, please obtain the written consent of your parents or legal guardians before using this service.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: If you are a minor under the age of 18, please obtain the written consent of your parents or legal guardians before using this service.

label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: If you are the guardian of minors, when you have any questions about the personal information of the minor information collected and handled in accordance with this policy, please contact us.

text: Special reminder, if you are a child under the age of 14, we also set up the "Jinshan Office Children Information Protection Statement" for you. You need to read carefully with your guardian before completing the registration and binding of this service."Jinshan Office Children's Information Protection Statement", you can use this service only after obtaining your guardian's consent of the "Jinshan Office Children Information Protection Statement".
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: If you are a child under the age of 14, you can use this service only after obtaining your guardian's consent of the "Jinshan Office Children's Information Protection Statement".

text: How to update this policy

In order to provide you with better services and with the development of our business, the provisions of this policy may be modified from time to time, but without your explicit consent, we will not reduce the rights you should enjoy in accordance with this policy.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: The provisions of this policy may be modified from time to time, but without your explicit consent, we will not reduce the rights you should enjoy in accordance with this policy.

text: After this policy is updated, we will show you the change of the policy in the form of push notifications and pop -ups when you log in and version update, so that you can understand the latest version of this policy in time.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: After this policy is updated, we will show you the changes to this policy so that you can understand the latest version of this policy in time.
